flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
This guide will demonstrate many of the steps required to build a working Co2 Gatling Gun.

This project requires some heavy duty work. Adult supervision is strongly recommended.
guide.introduction_rendered:
This guide will demonstrate many of the steps required to build a working Co2 Gatling Gun.

This project requires some heavy duty work. Adult supervision is strongly recommended.

lines.text: Step 1: Cut 3/4" thin walled PVC pipe into 6 cleanly cut 14" pieces.
lines.text_raw: Step 1: Cut 3/4" thin walled PVC pipe into 6 cleanly cut 14" pieces.

lines.text: Step 2: Starting 2"s from bottom, drill 1/4" holes every 1"  thru both sides, roll pipe 90º and drill the next set of holes (off set the holes so they don't exactly line up with the first set).
lines.text_raw: Step 2: Starting 2"s from bottom, drill 1/4" holes every 1"  thru both sides, roll pipe 90º and drill the next set of holes (off set the holes so they don't exactly line up with the first set).

guide.summary: Demonstrate how to build a working Co2 Gatling Gun.
guide.title: SteamPunk Co2 Gatling Gun - Working Costume Weapon
